metadata.Title: CVE-2014-3558 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
ReflectionHelper (org.hibernate.validator.util.ReflectionHelper) in Hibernate Validator 4.1.0 before 4.2.1, 4.3.x before 4.3.2, and 5.x before 5.1.2 allows attackers to bypass Java Security Manager (JSM) restrictions and execute restricted reflection calls via a crafted application.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3558` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libhibernate-validator-java - 4.2.1-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libhibernate-validator-java package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.2.1-2').
